info.title: Describes a collection VM workload instances.

istio.networking.v1alpha3.WorkloadGroup.description: WorkloadGroup enables specifying the properties of a single non-Kubernetes workload for VM bootstrap.

labels.description: Lables to associate with each workload in the group.

ports.description: Set of ports exposed by the workload instances in the group.

network.description: Name of network for the workload group.

serviceAccount.description: The service account associated with the workload instances.
